``` r
z_scores = function(x) {
  
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  z
  
}

z_scores(x)
##  [1] -0.49300887  0.09648258  0.39153396  1.92708130 -1.51622513
##  [6]  0.75319393 -0.72298923 -0.37741764 -0.51234365 -0.98240130
```
